import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function SignUp() { const onSignUp = (event) => { event.preventDefault() const form = document.signinForm let data = { email: form.email.value, password: form.password.value, } if (!localStorage.getItem('users') && isUserSignedUp(data.email)) { localStorage.setItem('users', [data]) } } const isUserSignedUp = () => {} return (
